name: PlugSurfing
tag_list: electric-cars, electric-vehicles, electric-scooter, ebike, charge-points, electric-vehicle-charging, charge-point-maps, gps, electric-car-charging, electric-vehicle-charging-locations, hybrid-cars
overview:
PlugSurfing is the world’s largest database for charging points of electric cars, ebikes & electric scooters with over 16000 charging points in the UK, EU, Australia, China, and Japan.

PlugSurfing is a community based project that aims to connect electric vehicle owners and drivers in the UK, EU, Australia, China, and Japan. with charging points. The service encourages owners of charging points to share their plugs with registered electric vehicle community members through an interactive website and smartphone app. The aim is to help overcome the poor charging inftrastructure in the UK, EU, Australia, China, and Japan and promote cleaner transport, carbon reduction, e-mobility and the strength of the community.
